roleset.name: cooperate, meet requirements

example.name: transitive
example.text: MiniScribe filed a status report detailing its efforts to comply with listing requirements ...

example.name: Arg 0 as PP
example.text: compliance by the executives who are really calling the shots

propbank.arg: by the executives who are really calling the shots

example.name: both args
example.text: compliance by floor traders with exchange and Commodity Futures Trading Commission rules .

propbank.arg: with exchange and Commodity Futures Trading Commission rules

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: Petco remained in compliance with all industry capital requirements .

roleset.note: COMPLY-V NOTES: Seems to occur mostly in the infinitive, so be careful oftrace-chains. They can get tricky. (from comply.01-v)
COMPLIANCE-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'comply'. No Vn class. Fn class compliance. Framed by Katie. (from compliance.01-n)
COMPLIANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from compliant.01-j)
